name: skin angiosarcoma
definition: An angiosarcoma and hemangioma of skin and malignant skin vascular tumor and sarcoma of skin that is located_in the skin and results_in an enlarged bruise (a blue-black nodule) and an unhealed ulceration. [url:http\://ezinearticles.com/?Symptoms-of-Angiosarcoma&id=2101634]

clinicalTrials.title: Alsertib (MLN8237) and Brentuximab Vedotin for Relapsed/Refractory CD30-Positive Lymphomas and Solid Malignancies
A Pilot Study of Oraxol in Subjects With Cutaneous Angiosarcoma
